Hi All,
my name is Aleks.  I'm a student at University of Virginia (I work
=
with metal alloys  www.virginia.edu/ms).  

AI is a brand new field to me a=
nd I'm trying to learn it.  I stumbled
across NEAT by accident when I was l=
ooking at implimentations of X-OR
gate using matlab.  I'm quite fascinated =
by what NEAT is designed to
do. I apologize for the quality of my questions=
, as they will not
contribute to the advancement of NEAT.  

 

To be hones=
t, I understand that NEAT evolves the nn arc but I'm not
very clear on what=
 the output represents.  I ran it few times and
noticed I get different res=
ults every time (now I know why) so I went
on the quest to figure it out.  =
I read tutorials on ai-junkie.com
(great tutorials, highly recommend!) so n=
ow I think I understand
something in terms of theory but not much in terms =
of practice.  I was
trying to take the output and verify it using matlab (l=
earn by
applying), and I'm not even going to show you my outputs. :) 

I wa=
s hoping someone would point me to the right direction to figure
out how to=
 interpret the output. For example if this is the output
what is the correc=
t architecture?
